definitions.text: a formal organization of people or groups of people
examples: he joined the Modern Language Association

definitions.text: the act of consorting with or joining with others
examples: you cannot be convicted of criminal guilt by association

definitions.text: the state of being connected together as in memory or imagination
examples: his association of his father with being beaten was too strong to break

definitions.text: the process of bringing ideas or events together in memory or imagination
examples: conditioning is a form of learning by association
he was sorry he had to sever his ties with other members of the team

definitions.text: a relation resulting from interaction or dependence
examples: flints were found in association with the prehistoric remains of the bear
the host is not always injured by association with a parasite

definitions.text: (chemistry) any process of combination (especially in solution) that depends on relatively weak chemical bonding
(ecology) a group of organisms (plants and animals) that live together in a certain geographical region and constitute a community with a few dominant species
